entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Akulivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:12 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -35.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Akulivik Airport 9:00 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
Temperature: -35.3°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -54
Dewpoint: -39.6°C
Wind: ESE 39 km/h gust 51 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and blowing snow beginning overnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 53 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:14 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 49 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:14 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:14 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
